definitions.text: a bank check that has been fraudulently altered to increase its face value
a bank check drawn on insufficient funds at another bank in order to take advantage of the float
plaything consisting of a light frame covered with tissue paper; flown in wind at end of a string
any of several small graceful hawks of the family Accipitridae having long pointed wings and feeding on insects and small animals
increase the amount (of a check) fraudulently
get credit or money by using a bad check
examples: The businessman kited millions of dollars

definitions.text: soar or fly like a kite
examples: The pilot kited for a long time over the mountains
Kids were kiting in the park
They kited the Red Dragon model
